title: Big Questions for the Second Half of the NBA Season | Group Chat
description:
Justin, Rob, and Tjarks are joined by Travonne Edwards of The Athletic to discuss which teams' first-half performances they're not buying as legitimate (02:00). Later, they discuss whether any teams in the East can stop the Nets or 76ers (18:00), as well as the best player who could be moved by the trade deadline (40:00).
Hosts: Justin Verrier, Rob Mahoney, and Jonathan Tjarks
Guest: Travonne Edwards
